title: Sun-Drenched Bahrain Oasis in Central Manama with Private Beach, Outdoor Pool & Onsite Dining
description:
Experience a slice of Arabian paradise at this Manama gem set along the shimmering shores of Bahrain. The resort features a private beach, tranquil spa and a variety of dining options, including Zytoun, serving Mediterranean and Middle Eastern cuisine all day, and La Perle dishing up some fresh seafood.

The resort is just a short drive from the Al-Fateh Grand Mosque and the Bahrain Fort, two must-visit historical sites. For a unique shopping experience, visit the Manama Souq, a traditional market filled with local goods and charming trinkets, perfect for finding the ideal holiday memento. After a day of exploration, return to the comfort of your spacious room, soak in the bathtub or enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool.
offer_address: 121 Sheikh, Shaikh Hamad Causeway, Manama 322, Bahrain

title: Cosmopolitan Bahrain Oasis in Heart of Manama with Outdoor Pool
description: A Middle-Eastern urban oasis is waiting for you to explore with a stay at Crowne Plaza Manama (Bahrain), an IHG Hotel. This enviable location offers you access to the capital’s commercial hub, while tantalising shopping destinations and the dazzling waterfront theatres and museums are only a short drive away. Take in a breathtaking sunset from the spectacular outdoor pool for a moment of respite or indulge in a meal at The Harvesters Pub & Terrace as you’re serenaded by a live band.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Manama (Bahrain), an IHG Hotel

title: Bahrain Private Pool Villa Indulgence with Three Onsite Restaurants & Spa
description:
Discover the ancient allure of Bahrain with a five-star stay at this prestigious Raffles oasis, located near the Al Areen Wildlife Park. Offering a tranquil retreat from the city's bustling centre, this idyllic property is home to a world-class spa and exquisite Middle Eastern cuisine served across three onsite restaurants.

Experience the rich history of Bahrain with a visit to the Bahrain Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, or take a leisurely stroll through the traditional Manama Souq. Back at the hotel, retreat to your private villa, complete with a temperature-controlled and luxurious pool and landscaped garden.

title: Elegant Bahrain All-Suite Retreat near Two Malls with Outdoor Pool & Shisha Lounge
description:
Immerse yourself in the captivating allure of Bahrain with a stylish stay at this Mercure oasis, ideally perched in Manama's upscale Seef district, mere moments from Seef Beach. Teeming with chic boutiques, myriad eateries and high-end shopping malls, including the Seef Mall and City Centre, this elegant address is the perfect launchpad for all your city explorations.

Unwind and relax in the hotel's plush suites equipped with all modern amenities, or go for a leisurely swim in the outdoor pool. When hunger strikes, savour authentic Bahraini cuisine at Neyran restaurant, sip on exquisite cocktails from the Sama poolside bar or indulge in shisha in the Moroccan-style Casa Lounge. After a day of outside adventures, return to your hotel for some rejuvenating treatments at the spa.
location_description: Mercure Grand Hotel Seef - All Suites

title: Five-Star Middle Eastern Escape Overlooking Bahrain Harbour
description: Relax in ultimate luxury at InterContinental Bahrain, an IHG Hotel, beautifully located overlooking the mesmerising Bahrain Financial Harbour. Surrounded by culture, Bahrain is the perfect destination for adventurous families or couples, with this hotel offering a glittering oasis in the Middle Eastern heat. Take a dip in the opulent swimming pool, partake in some self-care at Spa InterContinental or the onsite fitness centre, or indulge in an exquisite dining experience at one of the four onsite restaurants.
